bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Test Procedure for Thermal Evaluation of Insulation Systems for Liquid-Immersed Distribution and Power Transformers
Redline
IEEE Standard Test Procedure for Thermal Evaluation of Insulation Systems for Liquid-Immersed Distribution and Power Transformers - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.100-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.100-1999) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A test procedure to provide a uniform method for investigating the effect of operating temperature on the life expectancy of liquid-immersed transformers is provided. The test procedures are intended to provide data for the selection of a limiting hottest-spot temperature for rating purposes, provide data which may serve as the basis for a guide for loading, and permit the comparative evaluation of a proposed insulation system with reference to a system that has proven to be acceptable in service.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
